richad dokins (2)
bandaranayaka mahaththaya pancha maha balawegayak ekathu karagena pakshayak hadagena owunta sadharanayak karanna parata bassa.
eeta amatharawa thayilanthayen, oostreliyawen, engalanthayen, jarmaniyen, yuropayen genwana wahana balanne mage loku putha kushan piris.
eheth, warthamanaye aanduwe ho janadhipathiwarayage ho agamathiwarayage ho kamaththa gana salakilimath nowi, eeta erehi thinduwak dennata pawa swadhinakamak adhikaranaya wetha labi thibe.
mithotamulle khedawachakayen pasu me kunukasala prashnaya wisandima sandaha wadi awadhanayak aththenma yomu wuni.

nuwara dumriya magehi lassana wassana parisaraya thawa ketharam kalayakatada??apa giya sathiye senasurada dina charikawak giyemu..kadugannawa nagarayata gos ethanin dumriya maga osse api ihala kotte wetha langa wunemu...aarambhaya..apa aarambha kale kotuweni kadugannawata yannata pahayi panas pahata yana dumriyata naggemu..sithu se hitagenama gamana aarambha kalemu dan aduweyi aduweyi kiya sitiyath dumriye senanga nam aduwimak nowiya..niwadu dinak wima saha pasal niwaduwe awasana bhagaya wunisa thadabada ya pawathi bawa mage mathaya weyi.mewan mangin wadi awasthawala kshanikawa dumriye petti wadikirima ho nawa kalasatahan anuwa dumriya dhawanaya kirimak nam apa rate sidu nowe..eheth nawasilanthaye nam dumriya sewayama mangin matha padanamwa athi athara mangin wadi awasthawala dumriya wala dharithawaya saha dumriya ganana ibema wadiwena aakarayata kalasatahan sakasa atha..mehi di muhunapana wishalama gataluwa nam mangina ්ganana kalin nimanaya kara ganimata nohaki wimayi..ara ee chanalin kramayata nawalokaye dosthara mahatheku chanal karana aakarayata apita dumriye aasana wen karaganime hakiyawak thibune nam amathara dumriya madiri kalin ekkara ganme pahasukama departhamenthuwata labe..ese thibuni nam mangin wishala gananak sitinam nawa dumriya ek kirimatath antharjalaye niranthara yawathkalina wana dumriya kalasatahanata ema dumriya athulath kirimth kala pahasuwen kala haka.
